select pri.id, pri.code, pri.student_id, pri.fees_id, pri.price, pri.status, pri.pay_date, si.code as studentCode, si.name as studentName, si.images as studentImages, si.phone, fi.name as feesName from pay_record_info pri left join student_info si on (si.id = pri.student_id) left join fees_info fi on (fi.id = pri.fees_id) where 1 = 1
AND si.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{payRecordInfo.studentName},'%')
AND si.code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{payRecordInfo.studentCode},'%')
order by pri.pay_date desc
